sentences.en: A key tool of drilling multilateral horizontal well is retrievable whip stock.
sentences.cn: 钻多分枝水平井的关键工具是可回收式斜向器.

sentences.en: A multilateral nuclear test ban treaty was to be signed.
sentences.cn: 将签署一项禁止核试验的多边条约.

sentences.en: Currently, there are many restrictions that hamper the development of multilateral trade.
sentences.cn: 目前多边贸易的广泛开展, 还有着诸多的限制.

sentences.en: Global economics is a multilateral affair today, a dance with several partners.
sentences.cn: 今天的全球经济是一种多边关系,众国必须共舞.

sentences.en: However, the multilateral diplomacy that this forum offered never worked.
sentences.cn: 然而该论坛提供的多边外交从未生效.

sentences.en: Multilateral and bilateral economic and trade relations kept developing.
sentences.cn: 多双边经贸关系继续发展.

sentences.en: Multilateral environmental agreements can be as currently good international environmental regimes.
sentences.cn: 多边环境协定可视为当前较为有效的国际环境机制.

sentences.en: Multilateral initiatives are undermined or diluted by ultra - nationalist, bilateral and regional initiatives.
sentences.cn: 多边行动常被极端民族主义者, 双边或地区行动所破坏或损害.

sentences.en: The Agreement of International Investment: Is Multilateral Arrangement the Only Way?
sentences.cn: 国际投资协定: 多边安排是唯一的途径 吗 ?

sentences.en: The shift may also prove unsettling to the world's formal multilateral institutions.
sentences.cn: 世界的变迁也可能让全球官方多边机构不安.

sentences.en: Third, it is to set up Asian - Pacific energy safe multilateral co - operation system.
sentences.cn: 三是建立亚太能源安全多边合作体系.

sentences.en: This trade is a multilateral compensation, also known as hands compensation.
sentences.cn: 这种贸易就是多边补偿, 也叫转手补偿.

sentences.en: UNDP is the largest multilateral technical aid agency in the world.
sentences.cn: UNDP是世界上最大的多边技术援助机构.

sentences.en: Welcome multilateral cooperation, to provide you with competitive products.
sentences.cn: 欢迎多方合作, 为您提供有竞争力的产品.

sentences.en: What are the practical dividends we seek from our multilateral relationships?
sentences.cn: 我们想从多边关系中获得什么样的实际利益?

words.tran_cn: 多歧的；多国参加的；分成多部分的
[数]多边的；多国的，多国参加的

trans.tran_cn: 多方面的，多边的，多国的，多国参加的
trans.tran_en: involving several different countries or groups
